name: Chance be a Homeowner
description:
Introducing my current project to recreate Luck be a Landlord in Unity.

Spin the slot machine to earn Money to Pay rent. 

Select Symbols with interesting interactions and combos.

Check out the original game by Trampoline Tales here its a lot of fun and they are regularly updating it: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404850/Luck_be_a_Landlord/
